fields.name: Stop-In effects:
fields.value:
â€¢ One of the following happens at random:
- **Money for Bowser**: Player loses $200-600.
- **Bowser Revolution**: All money from players is share equally.
- **Bowser's Curse**: All players will only move with a single d3 on their next turn.
- **Bowser's Reverse Curse**: All players will move backwards on their next turn.
- **Bowser Shuffle**: All players shuffle spots on the board.
- **Bowser's Chance Time**: **Chance Time!** *(Chest 50)* is drawn, the second play is always whoever activated this spot.
- **Bowser's Charity**: Bowser gives $300 and ownership of a random property to the player with the least net worth.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If the player with the least net worth lands here, Bowser will only give them $200 without additional effects.
